#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N=12345;

struct Job {
    int stime;
    int ftime;
}job[N];

bool compare(Job a, Job b) {
    return a.ftime<b.ftime;
}

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
            scanf("%d %d", &job[i].stime, &job[i].ftime);
        }
        sort(job, job+n, compare);
        int ans=1;
        int freetime=job[0].ftime;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++) {
            if(freetime<job[i].stime) {
                freetime=job[i].ftime;
                ans++;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
}
